title: High Educational Attainment Among Males
description: In 2022, 65.53% of Montenegro's male population aged 25 and above had attained at least a Bachelor's degree, showcasing a strong emphasis on higher education for men.

title: Significant Educational Achievement
description: As of 2022, 61.09% of Montenegro's population aged 25 and above had achieved at least a Bachelor's degree, indicating a well-educated populace.

title: Low Industrial Design Activity
description: In 2020, Montenegro had only 1 resident industrial design application, reflecting minimal activity in this sector.

title: Minimal Arms Export
description: Montenegro's arms exports were valued at $1,000,000 in 2017, indicating a limited role in the global arms trade.

title: Low Measles Immunization Rate
description: In 2023, only 24% of children aged 12-23 months in Montenegro were immunized against measles, highlighting a critical public health concern.

title: Negligible Tariff Peaks on Manufactured Goods
description: In 2022, only 0.0014% of Montenegro's tariff lines on manufactured products had international peaks, indicating low trade barriers.

title: Minimal New Displacements Due to Disasters
description: In 2023, Montenegro reported only 1 new case of internal displacement due to disasters, suggesting effective disaster management strategies.

title: High Educational Attainment Among Females
description: In 2022, 58.19% of Montenegro's female population aged 25 and above had attained at least a Bachelor's degree, reflecting strong educational outcomes for women.
